org.vngx.jsch.kex

Class KexAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vngx.jsch.kex.KexAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDHKexAlgorithm

    public abstract class KexAlgorithm
extends Object
implements Algorithm

    Abstract class for defining key exchange algorithm implementations. After the SSH_MSG_KEXINIT message exchange, the key exchange algorithm is run. It may involve several packet exchanges, as specified by the key exchange method.

    The key exchange produces two values: a shared secret K, and an exchange hash H. Encryption and authentication keys are derived from these. The exchange hash H from the first key exchange is additionally used as the session identifier, which is a unique identifier for this connection. It is used by authentication methods as a part of the data that is signed as a proof of possession of a private key. Once computed, the session identifier is not changed, even if keys are later re-exchanged.

    Each key exchange method specifies a hash function that is used in the key exchange. The same hash algorithm MUST be used in key derivation. Here, we'll call it HASH.

    RFC 4253 - The Secure Shell (SSH) Transport Layer Protocol: Key Exchange

    Author:
    Michael Laudati
    See Also:
    KeyExchange

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Buffer _buffer
      Buffer for sending and receiving SSH packets.
      protected byte[] _H
      The exchange hash H used to derive the encryption and authentication keys.
      protected Hash _hash
      Hash instance used to hash values in key exchange.
      protected KeyType _hostKeyType
      Host key type.
      protected byte[] _K
      K is the shared secret created by both the server and the client used in key derivation.
      protected Packet _packet
      SSH packet for sending and receiving requests to SSH server for kex.
      protected Session _session
      Session the key exchange is for.
      protected int _state
      State code for current state of key exchange.
      protected byte[] I_C
      Client's SSH_MSG_KEXINIT payload sent to server.
      protected byte[] I_S
      Server's SSH_MSG_KEXINIT payload received from server.
      protected byte[] K_S
      K_S is the server's public host key.
      static int STATE_END
      Constant state code for when key exchange is completed.
      protected byte[] V_C
      Client version String sent to remote SSH server (CR and LF excluded).
      protected byte[] V_S
      Server version String read from SSH server response (CR and LF excluded).

    • Constructor Detail

      • KexAlgorithm

        protected KexAlgorithm(Hash hash)
        Creates a new instance of KexAlgorithm which uses the specified hash implementation for key exchange. Every kex algorithm must have a Hash which is used in key derivation for Ciphers and MACs used in the transport layer for the session.
        Parameters:
        hash - implementation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if hash is null

    • Method Detail

      • init

        protected void init(Session session,
                    byte[] I_C,
                    byte[] I_S)
             throws JSchException,
                    IOException
        Initializes the key exchange algorithm for the specified session, I_C client kex init and I_S server kex init payloads. Implementations should override the init method and start the specific key exchange algorithm process with the appropriate SSH message code.
        Parameters:
        session - instance
        I_C - client's KEXINIT payload
        I_S - server's KEXINIT payload
        Throws:
        JSchException - if any errors occur
        IOException - if any IO related errors occur

      • next

        protected abstract boolean next(Buffer buffer)
                         throws JSchException,
                                IOException
        Processes the next key exchange response from the server.
        Parameters:
        buffer - containing server response
        Returns:
        true if response processed successfully
        Throws:
        JSchException - if any errors occur
        IOException - if any IO errors occur

      • getState

        protected int getState()
        Returns the current state of the key exchange. Since the key exchange may take several requests back and forth between server and client, the state helps to track the process and ensure both sides are in the same state.
        Returns:
        state of key exchange process

      • getHash

        public Hash getHash()
        Returns the Hash instance used for the key exchange and key derivation for encryption.
        Returns:
        hash used for key exchange

      • getH

        public byte[] getH()
        Returns the exchange hash H generated in the key exchange. The exchange hash H is a sensitive piece of data and should be carefully protected and cleared after use.
        Returns:
        exchange hash H

      • getK

        public byte[] getK()
        Returns the shared secret key K generated during the key exchange. The shared secret is a sensitive piece of data and should be carefully protected and cleared after use.
        Returns:
        shared secret K
